ier to diagnose doubtful, early and stable ectopic pregnancies:
o If the serum beta HCG is ≥1500 mIU/mL and the uterus is empty on transvaginal ultrasound, there is a
pr
egnancy of unknown location and further work-up is needed.
o If the serum beta HCG is <1500 mIU/mL and the uterus appears empty on transvaginal ultrasound in an
ot
herwise stable patient, it may be a very early normal pregnancy or an ectopic pregnancy.
 Keep the patient for observation and repeat the beta HCG 48 hour
